#summary RSS feeds for the wt-commons project.
#labels Featured

= Why bother? =

It is often convenient to track changes to projects using an RSS feed.  Luckily the google-code team has made this easy to do by [http://google-code-updates.blogspot.com/2008/07/new-feeds-for-project-hosting-on-google.html surfacing feeds for hosted projects].


= Feeds =

You can build your own custom feeds following the advice [http://google-code-updates.blogspot.com/2008/07/new-feeds-for-project-hosting-on-google.html here].  As a jumping off point, here are a few useful ones:

  * [http://code.google.com/feeds/p/wt-commons/issueupdates/basic Issues]
  * [http://code.google.com/feeds/p/wt-commons/downloads/basic Downloads]
  * [http://code.google.com/feeds/p/wt-commons/svnchanges/basic Subversion changes]
  * [http://code.google.com/feeds/p/wt-commons/svnchanges/basic?path=/wiki/ Wiki changes]
